data.text: The first day I have moved they asked me about the breakfast.and i told them I donâ€™t like it because ther is no chicken for the breakfast  and mr david  who was working in the hotel told it to the chef and the next day they brought me a delicious chicken z
data.title: Nice

data.text:
Good :

Located at Al Barsha near the Mall of Emirates on Shiekh Zayed Road and hence a central location

The distance to all major attractions such as Dubai mall, Global Village, Museam of Future, is about half hour away by cabs. Cabs can be quite expensive

Close to Palm Jumeirah and JLT which are big residential hubs in case you have family in these locations

Small eateries on the street close by can be a change from Hotel food

Not so good :

Rooms are small and not the best aesthetics. We took a superior twin room
data.title: Good location, service is not remarkable

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rajiv N, 

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Novotel Dubai Al Barsha!

Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback with us. We are glad to hear that you found our hotel's location to be convenient, with easy access to major attractions and residential hubs. We appreciate your insights on the nearby eateries as well. Your comments about the room size and aesthetics are duly noted, and we will use this feedback to improve our services. We value your opinion and hope to have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Warm regards,
Alina Zapopadko
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Novotel and Adagio Premium Dubai Al Barsha

data.text: clean and cozy room,.friendly waiters and waitresses specially Smriti thank you so much for making our stay fun and feel like family, very nice hotel and very comfortable . it is near to metro also . saftnice food..........................
data.title: 365 Resturant

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

 We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Novotel Dubai Al Barsha!

Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to hear that you found our rooms clean and cozy, and that our waiters and waitresses, especially Smriti, provided friendly service that made you feel like family. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and found the hotel very nice and comfortable. It's great to know that the hotel is conveniently located near the metro. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we hope to welcome you back for another enjoyable experience.

Warm regards,
Alina Zapopadko
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Novotel and Adagio Premium Dubai Al Barsha

data.text: Warm,clean and comfortable. Staff are professional, nice food. Staying was very nice and comfortable and miss smriti thank you for the best service . we are gonna come again and i will suggest this hotel to stay ....-----------------------
data.title: Nice impression

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Novotel Dubai Al Barsha!Thank you for sharing your positive impression with us. We are thrilled to hear that you found our hotel warm, clean, and comfortable, and that our staff provided professional service. It's great to know that you enjoyed the food and that your stay was very nice and comfortable. We will pass on your thanks to Miss Smriti for her excellent service. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay.

Warm regards,
Alina Zapopadko
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Novotel and Adagio Premium Dubai Al Barsha

data.text: Good hotel for family. Location is very convenient and rooms are clean. The staffs are really good and kind hearted. Breakfast was great , definitely we have a remarkable stay. We also get late check out until two without asking . Thanks to Ana , I Shani and Faith at reception
data.title: Great staffs

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

 We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Novotel Dubai Al Barsha!
We are delighted to hear that you had a great experience with our staff, found the hotel suitable for families, and enjoyed the convenient location and clean rooms. It's wonderful to know that the staff were good and kind-hearted, and that you had a great breakfast experience. We are pleased that you had a remarkable stay and were able to enjoy a late check-out until two without even asking. Thank you for recognizing Ana, Ishani, and Faith at the reception. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit.

Warm regards,
Alina Zapopadko
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Novotel and Adagio Premium Dubai Al Barsha
